title: When the enemy suddenly appears behind you, so you panic flash

replies.body:
My panic flash usually looks more like this >.>

http://i.imgur.com/Axkx0Ky.gif?noredirect
That 37th time you try to flash a wall only to discover once again why you're still in silver.
You could not possibly get any more accurate to my experience.  Especially if a Xin Zhou is banking me.

> [{quoted}](name=WitchKing007,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=LZNUUEEY,comment-id=00030002,timestamp=2016-08-30T23:45:47.152+0000)
>
> You could not possibly get any more accurate to my experience.  Especially if a Xin Zhou is banking me.

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-2rQJVLKAkJw/VOz199CIQ6I/AAAAAAAAki4/dWPd12pTkWM/s1600/xinrecal.jpg

banking
This is the most true statement in my league career.

{{champion:27}} Behind me? Right where I want them
http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/1f49b410ca9e886409ad12fee9c29bb2.jpg
{{champion:17}} I'm not locked in here with you...
Wait who is that in the pic? :O

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=LZNUUEEY,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-08-30T12:56:26.170+0000)
>
> http://67.media.tumblr.com/8dd4ea7f3301d8434b96efb8f5fffc1d/tumblr_o52sgiCp271slwrsuo1_400.gif

when you flash to dodge an ability and start bming afterwards 

http://giphy.com/gifs/bgc11-splits-dodging-IL82hCECWYNdm
Whenever I do panic flash, I always seem to flash directly into the embrace of another enemy.

I totally have never done this once in my life ever. not once...

nope never.....


shut up and take my upvote dammit *cries in a corner*
but its a master yi and he used q already

Panic flashes into wall 

http://i.makeagif.com/media/9-09-2015/LQGZub.gif

_"You have been slain"_

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

I like the slow motion, I was also listening to this while watching it:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R-I86eGJh-M
Or when {{champion:107}}  leaps on {{champion:76}}  and she uses w.
